import sys

import heapq

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    ingredients = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
    heapq.heapify(ingredients)
    while len(ingredients) > 1:
        heapq.heappush(ingredients, (heapq.heappop(ingredients) + heapq.heappop(ingredients)) / 2)
    print(ingredients[0])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


import heapq

def main():
    n = int(input())
    ingredients = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    heapq.heapify(ingredients)
    while len(ingredients) > 1:
        heapq.heappush(ingredients, (heapq.heappop(ingredients) + heapq.heappop(ingredients)) // 2)
    print(ingredients[0])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    pass


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    v = list(map(int, input().split()))
    v.sort()
    while len(v) > 1:
        a = v.pop()
        b = v.pop()
        v.append((a + b) / 2)
        v.sort()
    print(v[0])


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
